ygData.subject: Re: Made 45 last night and love my new song :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is awesome.  I was using it in Mistmoore to break up all sorts of areas for friends in other groups.  You want the pit but can t fight 5 mobs at once?
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 18 Jan 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> Made 45 last night finally. Also over the weekend I re-discovered the joys
> of an old song, Lugborious Lament :) It started in Sol B when I was the

It is awesome. I was using it in Mistmoore to break up all
sorts of areas for friends in other groups. You want the pit
but can't fight 5 mobs at once? Lull lull lull lull. You
want the imp familiar but the graveyard is fully spawned?
Lull lull lull lull lull lull.

> only tank in a group at the Sol A bug line. I deciced to give Lament a try
> and it worked better then I remember. Was lulling bats, beetles, LDCs, Nox,
> anything that got in my way :)

I've noticed that animals and insects seem particularly
vulnerable to our songs, like they have a lower base magic
resist. I remember fearing sonic bats when I was level 31.

> Then last night after Vox (which was John's (tm) first dragon run btw) I

Heh. Two ice giants spawned on top of my group literally half
a second after we were given the order to move in. I got to
see Vox for about 30 seconds before she dropped, then died 15
seconds later to the giants.

Congratulations on the new horn. Immediately after Rokenn won
the lotto, he was dancing around like a kid on Christmas
trying out his new toy (literally - the horn animation has
the dance :).

> Our cleric pulls the lord and eats the HT with an invulnerbility

That is a helluva good idea.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
